Title: Deep Water
Plot: As suspicions arise that "road agents" may have been the true perpetrators of the massacre, Swearengen takes a special interest in the health of its sole survivor, a young girl ministered to by the unlikely team of Doc Cochran and Calamity Jane. Meanwhile, Bullock and Star attempt to buy property from Swearengen, who suspects an alliance between Hickok and these hardware boys. At the Grand Central Hotel, Brom Garret rethinks his recent investment, while his wife Alma medicates her anxieties. And
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Tammy Brooks, Nick Offerman, Jeffrey Jones, Timothy Omundson, Ray McKinnon, Keone Young, Joe Chrest, Jane Leigh Connelly, Dean Rader-Duval, Dan Hildebrand, Cheryl Huggins, Toni Oswald, Steven Alford
